attributes.additional_details:
I have 3 dogs whom have been subjected to terrible distress over the last 2 nights. 

Social media is full of the same thing .  It is unfair, distressing and I'm sure humans that suffer PTS are struggling too.
attributes.background: Ban sales of noisey fireworks and limit their use to one day alone.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for similar actions:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354

Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319
